body:
Edit it

You can edit pending, active, or paused campaigns anytime right from your AdRoll dashboard.

1. Go to "Campaigns" on your AdRoll dashboard.

2. Scroll down and click on the name of the campaign you want to edit.

3. After the campaign page loads, click on the "Edit Campaign" button in the right sidebar.

4. Make your edits. Make sure you save through to "Update Campaign".

Do edits apply immediately to my campaign?

Changes that do not affect your campaign's content will apply immediately. For example:

  • Campaign budget
  • Date range (e.g. adding an end date)
  • Adding or removing audience segments
  • Removing or pausing an ad in your campaign

The only time that there will be a delay is if the changes you've made need to be reviewed for content. In the cases below, changes will appear as pending and will be reviewed within 1 business day of submission.

  • Adding new ads to your campaign
  • Editing your ad's landing page
  • Editing your Facebook ad's text fields

Can I edit completed or rejected campaigns?

If your campaign has been completed or rejected, it is no longer active and cannot be edited. Instead, launch a new campaign with your updates.
name: Editing Your Campaign
title: Editing Your Campaign
